title: How to Boil and Make Beetroot Rasam

steps.headline: Add chopped pieces of beetroot in a utensil.
Boil the pieces of the beetroot.
Remove the utensil from the gas stove once the pieces are boiled.
Sieve the water in a separate utensil.
Mix all of them with a ladle.
Bring it to boil on a gas stove.
Add oil, whole red chili, cumin seeds, mustard seeds and white lentils.
steps.description: Sauté them for a while and add asafoetida.Add it to the rasam.

steps.headline: Remove the utensil from the stove.
Serve it with rice or as an appetizer.

text: Add chopped pieces of beetroot in a utensil.  Wash under running water.  Add water.  Boil the pieces of the beetroot.  Remove the utensil from the gas stove once the pieces are boiled.  Sieve the water in a separate utensil.  Add grated coconut.  Add chopped tomatoes.  Add chopped fresh coriander leaves.  Add chopped green chilies.  Add turmeric powder.  Add rasam powder.  Add Salt.  Mix all of them with a ladle.  Bring it to boil on a gas stove.  Add oil, whole red chili, cumin seeds, mustard seeds and white lentils. Sauté them for a while and add asafoetida.Add it to the rasam. Remove the utensil from the stove.  Add lemon juice.  Serve it with rice or as an appetizer.
